txt.en: 'I thank you. We should be able to trade this precious ore for more suitable building materials.'

Mineral riches await those who brave the perilous cliff road circling Mount Doom.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires The Burning Mountain: Blood Wings to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Bring the obsidian ore to Candúr

Mineral riches await those who brave the perilous cliff road circling Mount Doom.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires The Burning Mountain: Blood Wings to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Return to Candúr with the obsidian ore.
